title: How to check the camera quality of a smartphone - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How do you check the camera quality of a smartphone? A: Take pictures. Take them in all the situations that you will be using it in (day, night, etc.)Look at the pictures as you will normally be using them, if you like the pictures then its good enough for youDon't be zooming in on them if you don't normally look at them zoomed (we don't) then don’t do this testPrint some pics, if you will definitely be printing them in future,if you don't do this normally then don’t do this testDisplay the pics on all the various displays that you will look at the pics on, if you don't do this normally then don’t do this testShare the pics with anyone that you normally would share them with, if you don't do this normally then don’t do this testPost the pics o your favorite websites, if you don't do this normally then don’t do this test

You mean the number of megapixels, as opposed to “subjective” quality? Either look up the specs of your phone online, or tap the “info” button or equivalent on on of your photos to see the pixel dimensions.
